description: This file defines the Response class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which models a JSON-RPC response message used in WebSocket communications. It inherits from a base Message class and provides methods to access response ID, determine if it represents a result or error, retrieve result/error data, and validate the response.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response details and validate its correctness.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object if present.
